Saya -Your Personal AI Knowledge Assistant. Get instant summaries, chat with your data, and save PDFs and web pages as you browse.

**Top Features**
✅ TLDR Summaries: Our AI website summary extension provides you with the gist of any webpage in seconds.
✅ Chat as you browse: Understand context better, and chat with any page or pdf you have.
✅ Save and view your data: Save any PDF, web page, or podcast to Saya for instant references, and summarizations, later.
✅ Instant summaries as you browse: Saya can optionally instantly summarize your pages as you browse them.
✅ Share Summaries: Share insights and summaries with friends, peers, or on social media using our AI website summary tool.

**Works best with**
• News articles and blog posts
• Research papers and academic content
• Product reviews and comparisons
• How-to guides and tutorials
• Opinion pieces and essays

**Tech features**
- Works instantly: 5 seconds on average
- You can summarize even the longest articles with our AI website summarizer tool.
- Saya is powered by OpenAI ChatGPT API, making it a reliable AI website summary tool.

Our AI website summary extension is designed to help you grasp the essence of any webpage in a matter of seconds. Whether you're reading a news article, a research paper, or a product review, our AI summarizer will provide you with a concise summary and key insights. You can even summarize comments to understand the general sentiment of readers.

With support for over 40 languages, our AI website summarization tool breaks down language barriers, making information accessible to everyone. Plus, our timestamped breakdowns allow you to navigate through lengthy articles with ease. Share your summaries and insights with friends, peers, or on social media with just a click.

With an average processing time of just 5 seconds, you can summarize even the longest articles effortlessly. Powered by OpenAI ChatGPT API, Saya is your go-to tool for quick and accurate website summaries. Don't waste time reading through endless content — get the key ideas you need with Saya, and stay informed in a fraction of the time.
